text: adamge daruvani, numbalage demapiyan svarga uyanin ohu bæhæra kalak men seyitan numbala va vyakulatvayata pat nokala yutuya. ovun dedenata ovun dedenage rahasya pedes penvima pinisa ovun dedenage vastra ovun dedenagen ohu galava dæmiya. niyata vasayenma numbala ovun va nodakina ayurin ohu ha ohuge gotrikayin numbala va dakiyi. (satyaya) visvasa nokarannanhata hita mituran lesa niyata vasayenma api seyitanun va pat kalemu
